channel.title: My way of staking (Really owns :D)
channel.description:
[ul]Hai der forumers :D
I am sharing a good guide to cheap stakers :rolleyes:
Not so much cheap but here we go
If ur a ranger/mager this should be pretty easy.
Levels needed: 50mage At least like 45range to acctualy hit
Items Needed: A bow (Willow/Yew/Mage) 100steels or up These are low recommendation's And wat I state below ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Get ur self a snare x4 (Depends on levels and stuff) Personaly i take 4-6snares (Items needed: 4earth 4waters 3natures) Thats 1 snare
Get a bow and Some arrows
Now you are ready...
Get your self a iron plate steel scimmy monk robe and ammy acc to look like a nub
Say Staking my lvls and rules
Now block food and everything exept Mage/Range/Melee/Movment
Stake what ever you want
When you are in the arena quickly snare him then start attacking while he is snared then snare him again ect. Until he is gone.. :D
[u]Recommendation's[/u] [list] [li]60range[/li] [li]50mage[/li] [li]A williow or yew bow for apperance, mage for fight[/li] [li]Mithril arrows or up[/li][/list]
I have made 730k so far and 13purple sweets
_-_-_Hope it helps_-_-_
Dont flame me plz ^.^ this is what works best for meh[/ul]

item.title: My way of staking (Really owns :D)
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Kaza:

This would only work against with somone using melee, because if you tried it with range, you would probably miss because of the Mage Defence from the Dragon hide, then it would waste time, and be dead as you shoot your first arrows.

Well no shit, you can’t farcast a mage or archer.

Read full topic

item.title: My way of staking (Really owns :D)
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[ul]Hai der forumers

I am sharing a good guide to cheap stakers :rolleyes:

Not so much cheap but here we go

If ur a ranger/mager this should be pretty easy.

Levels needed:
50mage
At least like 45range to acctualy hit

Items Needed:
A bow (Willow/Yew/Mage)
100steels or up
These are low recommendation’s
And wat I state below

Get ur self a snare x4 (Depends on levels and stuff) Personaly i take 4-6snares (Items needed: 4earth 4waters 3natures) Thats 1 snare

Get a bow and Some arrows

Now you are ready...

Get your self a iron plate steel scimmy monk robe and ammy acc to look like a nub

Say Staking my lvls and rules

Now block food and everything exept Mage/Range/Melee/Movment

Stake what ever you want

When you are in the arena quickly snare him then start attacking while he is snared then snare him again ect. Until he is gone.. :D

[u]Recommendation's[/u]
[list]
[li]60range[/li]
[li]50mage[/li]
[li]A williow or yew bow for apperance, mage for fight[/li]
[li]Mithril arrows or up[/li][/list]

I have made 730k so far and 13purple sweets

_-_-_Hope it helps_-_-_

Dont flame me plz ^.^ this is what works best for meh[/ul]
